segments.text: You would be using mainly English in this job . Do you think you could manage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am sure I can .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think you are proficient in both written and spoken English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think I am quite proficient in both written and spoken English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think you can make yourself understood in English with ease ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think I can in ordinary circumstances .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think you can speak English quite fluently ? Tell me about your English education .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think I speak English quite fluently . I got a high score on TOEFL . I majored in English in college .
segments.speaker: S2
